EmailTemplate.description: Honeywell Aerospace has established spare parts pricing for Commercial Operators, Non-Operators and Business and General Aviation customers for the period starting January 1, 2013....
EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Aerospace Spare Parts Pricing
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace Spare Parts Catalog – 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spare Parts Catalog – 2013 {{system.date:default=edit me}} Honeywell Aerospace 1944 E. Sky Harbor Circle Phoenix, AZ 85034
Honeywell Aerospace has established spare parts pricing for Commercial Operators, Non-Operators and Business and General Aviation customers for the period starting January 1, 2013. These price lists will be available both via part number search and via downloadable files in Excel format beginning October 1, 2012, at http://myaerospace.com <http://myaerospace.com> under “Products”.
Our catalogs also will contain a consolidated listing of products and services provided by Honeywell Aerospace facilities. Instructions to gain access to the catalog and other web tools are available through the web site at http://myaerospace.com.
If you encounter problems obtaining information from our web site or need technical assistance, please contact the Honeywell Aerospace Customer Help Desk at (800) 601-3099 (U.S. and Canada) or (602) 365-3099 (International). The center is available to you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Additionally, you can request help via Feedback Form under the “Contact Us” section at http://myaerospace.com <http://myaerospace.com>.
We look forward to working with you in the coming year.
Regards,
David Waxberg Sr. Director, eCommerce Honeywell Aerospace
